Channel Divinity: Can use a Channel Divinity effect 3 times per short rest
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of Azuth and fellow believers

Combat
Hit Points: 89 Initiative: -2 Armor Class: 10 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Simple Weapons
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Handaxe (+7 1d6+1 R20/60); Light Crossbow (+4 1d8-2 R80/320); Mace (+7 1d6+1); Unarmed (+7 1+1)
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: -2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: -2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: -2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Arcane Abjuration: R30' May turn a celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend, banishing up to CR 4, (DC 18 Wisdom neg) for 1 min
Destroy Undead: Turning destroys undead up to CR 4
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Grappler: Has advantage on attacks on a grappled foe and can restrain a grappled foe with an additional successful grapple
Turn Undead: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to make undead flee (save DC 18 Wisdom negates) for 1 min
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 9; Constitution: 0; Dexterity: -2; Intelligence: -1; Strength: 1; Wisdom: 10
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 5; C1: 4; C2: 3; C3: 3; C4: 3; C5: 3; C6: 2; C7: 2; C8: 1; C9: 1; D0: 2; D1: 1 Attack: C: 10; D: 10 Spell DC: C: 18; D: 18
Spells:
Aid (C2 Abju): R30' 3 targets gain +5 hit points for 8 hr [+Level gives +5 temporary hit points]
Arcane Eye (C4 [Arcana Domain] Divi): R30' Self sees with darkvision through a remote invisible eye that can move 30' per rd for concentration up to 1 hr
Astral Projection (C9 Necr): R10' Self and 8 willing targets project to astral plane
Bane (C1 Ench): R30' 3 targets suffer -1d4 on attacks and saving throws (save Charisma negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Conjure Celestial (C7 Conj): R90' Summons an obedient CR 4 celestial for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level increases the CR to 5 at level 9]
Create Food And Water (C3 Conj): R30' Creates 45 lb of food and 30 gallons of water
Cure Wounds (C1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+4 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Death Ward (C4 Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP or survives next death effect within 8 hrs
Detect Evil And Good (C1 Divi): R30' Reveals aberrations, celestials, elementals, feys, fiends, undead, consecration, and desecration for concentration up to 10 min
Detect Magic (C1 Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Detect Magic (C1 [Arcana Domain] Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Dispel Magic (C3 [Arcana Domain] Abju): R120' Ends the effects on the target of a spell up to level 3, and successful DC 10 + spell level checks end each higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Divination (C4 Divi): Answers a question about an event up to 7 days in the future; additional uses before a long rest add a 25% chance of failure [R]
Earthquake (C8 Evoc): R500' 100' radius opens fissures, damages structures, breaks concentration (save Constitution negates), and knocks prone (save Dexterity negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Find Traps (C2 Divi): R120' Reveals the presence of traps
Flame Strike (C5 Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP radiant (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP of a choice of fire or radiant]
Guardian Of Faith (C4 Conj): R30' 10' radius inflicts 20 HP radiant to hostile creatures (save Dexterity half) for 8 hr or until 60 HP inflicted
Guidance (C0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check within concentration up to 1 min
Hallow (C5 Evoc): 60' radius becomes warded against celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead and their effects and evokes a boon effect
Heroes' Feast (C6 Conj): R30' 12 diners recover from disease and poison and gain immunity to poison and fright, advantage on Wisdom, and +2d10 hit points and maximum hit points for 24 hr
Hold Person (C2 Ench): R60' Immobilizes the target humanoid (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Legend Lore (C5 Divi): Reveals info about a specified person, place, or object
Leomund's Secret Chest (C4 [Arcana Domain] Conj): Self can move a touched 12 cubic ft chest to and from the Ethereal Plane for 60+ days
Light (C0 Evoc): Touched object lights a 20' radius (save Dexterity negates) for 1 hr
Magic Circle (C3 [Arcana Domain] Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents a choice of physical entry or exit (save Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts disadvantage on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by one or more choices of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead, for 1 hr [+Level extends the duration +1 hr]
Magic Missile (C1 [Arcana Domain] Evoc): R120' 3 darts inflict 1d4+1 HP force each [+Level creates +1 dart]
Magic Weapon (C2 [Arcana Domain] Tran): Gives touched weapon a +1 magic bonus for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level gives a +2 or +3 bonus at level 4 or 6]
Mass Healing Word (C3 Evoc): R60' 6 targets regain 1d4+4 HP [+Level restores +1d4 HP]
Mending (C0 Tran): Touch repairs a break or tear up to 1 ft
Nystul's Magic Aura (C2 [Arcana Domain] Illu): Divinations on a willing target report false information for 24 hr
Planar Ally (C6 Conj): R60' Bargains for service from an otherworldly entity
Planar Binding (C5 [Arcana Domain] Abju): R60' Binds a celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend to service (save Charisma negates) for 1 day [+Level extends the duration to 10, 30, 180, or 366 days at level 6, 7, 8, or 9]
Regenerate (C7 Tran): Touched regains 4d8+15 HP, plus 1 HP per rd for 1 hr, and reattaches or regrows severed parts after 2 min
Sacred Flame (C0 Evoc): R60' Inflicts 4d8 HP radiant (save Dexterity negates)
Teleportation Circle (C5 [Arcana Domain] Conj): R10' Creates a portal that provides a link to similar circles for 1 rd
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects—a booming voice, modification of flames, harmless tremors, an illusory sound, movement of a door or window, or a change in eye appearance—for 1 min
Tongues (C3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Druid): Knows 2 druid cantrips/Can cast a chosen D1 spell once per long rest
Arcane Initiate: Knows two W0 cantrips
Arcane Mastery: May add 1 each W6, W7, W8, and W9 spells as domain spells
Divine Intervention: Has a 100% chance to gain help from Azuth once per week
Elemental Adept (Acid): Spells that inflict acid damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Spells that inflict lightning damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Potent Spellcasting: +4 Cleric cantrip damage
Spell Breaker: Casting a healing spell also dispels a spell of equal or lesser level affecting target
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the cleric spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
